result.purpose: Responsible for implementing the client and models for verifying turnstile challenges.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating functionality related to turnstile verification in separate files.

internal/infras/turnstile/client.go.purpose: Implements a client for verifying turnstile challenges.

internal/infras/turnstile/models.go.purpose: Defines models for handling turnstile verification requests and responses.
